modName: deleteWood Elf Sparrow as Companion and Marriage
summary:
Sparrow is a Wood Elf with a history (check description)
He offers his service for 500 gold (follower).
It\'s also possible to marry Sparrow.
descriptionHtml:
Also possible to get the mod from Steam Workshop now:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=110931420

Please endorse me if you like this mod, thanks :) I do appreciate it!

[Story Update!]
Sparrow is a good person who follows his heart wherever it may lead him. But it has been a lonely journey for him so far. Deep inside his heart, he hopes to meet a new friend and maybe something more as he is not getting any closer to finding his unknown twin brother so far..



Sparrow v0.2 is released! and thanks for checking out the first plugin\\mod that I\'ve ever made.
Fair and balanced plugin\\mod :)



[Changes Done]
- More dialogue added that follows that of being a hireling, follower and someone you can marry.
- Is now a level 8 NPC that will level with you.
- Learned some new perks within Destruction, Restoration and Alteration.
- His spells are now Magelight, Oakflesh, Flames, Healing.



[Future Updates]
- Adding a house or something similiar in Winterhold that will have a connection with Sparrow somehow. Perhaps a house that should had gone down the hill because of what happened to Winterhold but for some mysterious reasons it didn\'t. Just almost tho. We will see.



[Short Description] *UPDATED*
Sparrow has traveled far in search for his unknown twin brother. Sparrow is now in Winterhold, usually in The Frozen Hearth where he offers some service (as hireling) in order to get some gold coins.



[His Journey Continues]
Sparrow has left Riverwood and is moving deeper into the province of Skyrim, towards a much colder part.



[Backstory]
He has a twin and that is why he in the first place was caught on the border to Skyrim. After sometime searching for his twin in other provinces, he ended up in Skyrim. But his twin brother doesn\'t know about him and Sparrow did just recently (nine months ago) learned that he had a twin brother that was separated from him at birth.

But right now he has stopped in Riverwood and are staying at the Sleeping Giant Inn.
Because after being on the road for a long time plus all the trouble on the way, Sparrow needed to catch his breath and gather his thoughts a little.
And he has not given up on finding his twin brother! Will probably leave Riverwood very soon..



[Updates]
v0.2 | Completed
Sparrow changes
- More dialogue added that follows that of being a hireling, follower and someone you can marry.
- Is now a level 8 NPC that will level with you.
- Learned some new perks within Destruction, Restoration and Alteration.
- His spells are now Magelight, Oakflesh, Flames, Healing.
- New outfit for him.

v0.1
Sparrow
- Rests\\lives at Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood
- Is level 2 with Novice Destruction Robe and Steel Dagger.
- Learns \'Flames\' and \'Healing\' plus \'Novice Destruction\' perk.
- Sparrow will follow you anywhere.
- Should be able to marry.



[Installing]
1. Just unzip \'Sparrow.esp\' and \'textures\' into the Skyrim\'s \'Data\' folder.



[If enough people like this mod, I\'ll work more on it]
- Such as adding more on the story about his twin brother and put that into the game, using both him and his twin brother.

It all started here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27090/ :)
author: ValenwoodElf
